name.baseName: Soil remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Enhanced bioremediation ; Equipment operation ; Injection of biomass culture medium
土壤修复;原位修复;生物强化修复;设备运行;生物培养基注射

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: CHC+ISB is used for site remediation, and during the equipment operation phase, the injection of the biomass culture medium occurs.
本数据集描述了土壤原位生物强化修复的工业过程，特别是在含氯挥发性有机化合物（CVOCs）污染场地治疗期间，用于注射生物培养基的设备操作。适用于旨在处理均匀污染含水层的环境工程项目，特别是与上海指定场地的条件相似的含水层，即表面积为20,000平方米、深度为50米的场地。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The aquifer in a certain area in Shanghai, China, is uniformly contaminated with chlorinated volatile organic compounds (CVOCs), with a surface area of 20,000 m2 and a depth of 50 m, with the water table located at a depth of 30 m.

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset describes the industrial process of in-situ enhanced bioremediation for soil remediation, specifically the operation of equipment used in the injection of a biomass culture medium during the treatment of sites contaminated with chlorinated volatile organic compounds (CVOCs). It is applicable for environmental engineering projects aiming to treat uniformly contaminated aquifers, particularly those with similar conditions to the specified site in Shanghai with a surface area of 20,000 m² and a depth of 50 m.
本数据集描述了土壤原位生物强化修复的工业过程，特别是在含氯挥发性有机化合物（CVOCs）污染场地治疗期间，用于注射生物培养基的设备操作。适用于旨在处理均匀污染含水层的环境工程项目，特别是与上海指定场地的条件相似的含水层，即表面积为20,000平方米、深度为50米的场地。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ni, Z. et al. Comparative Life-Cycle Assessment of Aquifer Thermal Energy Storage Integrated with in Situ Bioremediation of Chlorinated Volatile Organic Compounds. Environ. Sci. Technol. 54, 3039–3049 (2020).

Ni, Z. et al. Comparative Life-Cycle Assessment of Aquifer Thermal Energy Storage Integrated with in Situ Bioremediation of Chlorinated Volatile Organic Compounds. Environ. Sci. Technol. 54, 3039–3049 (2020).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this dataset should specifically consider this process for remediation projects where in-situ bioremediation is feasible. The technology is designed for aquifers with depths and contamination characteristics similar to those described for the Shanghai site. Users should ensure that local hydrogeological conditions are adequately matched. Data users must exercise caution when generalizing the results for different environmental conditions or contamination levels and are advised to adjust the treatment parameters based on site-specific assessments, including aquifer characteristics and contaminant concentration profiles.
本数据集的用户应特别考虑在原位生物修复可行的修复项目中使用此过程。该技术是为深度和污染特征与上海站点所描述的类似的含水层而设计的。用户应确保与当地的水文地质条件相匹配。当将结果泛化到不同的环境条件或污染水平时，数据用户必须小心谨慎，并建议根据场地特定评估调整治疗参数，包括含水层特性和污染物浓度剖面。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
